clients.title: Get the Google My Business Mobile App
description: Business owners can access their Google My Business (GMB) accounts on the go using the Google My Business app for iOS and Android. Now you can easily track, manage, and edit your business information on Google. With the GMB app, you get real-time notifications about reviews, messages and updates. Additionally, you can create and publish content by using the Google Posts feature. Read Googleâ€™s documentation on the GMB app here:
